snippet.title: Sonic Mania Plus | Launch Trailer | PS4
snippet.description:
Sonic Mania Plus arrives 17th July! Check out the game’s new features, a first look at Mighty and Ray, and treat your ears to a special remix of “Time Trials” by Hyper Potions and Jun Senoue! 

Sonic Mania Plus is available both as a physical copy and as DLC if you already own the game. The physical edition comes with special packaging, a reversible cover, and a 32 Page Art Book.
